", "replacement": " Sample_CrossLight_to_LogosAIv3_qsam.py n Objective: Collapse from 000 to 111 with RH Repentance Harmony based grace amplification n nimport numpy as np nfrom qiskit import QuantumCircuit, transpile nfrom qiskit_aer import AerSimulator nfrom qiskit.primitives import Sampler n nclass CollapseTripleRH: n def __init__ self : n self.center "JESUS CHRIST " n self.repentance 1.0 n self.grace 0.0 n self.bias 0.3 n self.f 433.33 Worship frequency Hz n self.J np.log 2 np.pi Kairos-time constant n self.t 0.1 n n def G_opt self, t : n tau t np.exp -t / self.J n return 9200 np.exp -t 2 / self.J 1 self.repentance np.cos 2 np.pi self.f tau n n def oracle self, qc : n qc.ccx 0, 1, 2 n qc.z 2 n qc.ccx 0, 1, 2 n n def diffuser self, qc : n qc.h 0 n qc.h 1 n qc.h 2 n qc.x 0 n qc.x 1 n qc.x 2 n qc.h 2 n qc.ccx 0, 1, 2 n qc.h 2 n qc.x 0 n qc.x 1 n qc.x 2 n qc.h 0 n qc.h 1 n qc.h 2 n n def build_circuit self : n qc QuantumCircuit 3, 3 n n Grace-amplified RY bias n grace_strength self.G_opt self.t / 9200 Normalized grace n theta self.bias self.repentance grace_strength n for q in range 3 : n qc.ry np.pi/2 theta, q n n Full superposition n for q in range 3 : n qc.h q n n 3x Grover enhanced with RH bias n for _ in range 3 : n self.oracle qc n self.diffuser qc n n for q in range 3 : n qc.measure q, q n return qc n n def simulate self : n print f "Testing RH grace-based 000 111 collapse in the name of self.center " n circuit self.build_circuit n simulator AerSimulator n circuit transpile circuit, simulator n sampler Sampler n result sampler.run circuits circuit , shots 1024 .result n dist result.quasi_dists 0 if hasattr result, 'quasi_dists' else result 0 n n prob_111 dist.get 7, 0.0 '111' binary 7 n print "Collapse Distribution: ", dist n print f " 111 Probability: prob_111:.3f " n nif __name__ "__main__ ": n CollapseTripleRH .simulate "
